ca.utoronto.utm.paint

类 Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape
        • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    Subclass from Shape, which allows the user to draw straight lines by click and drag on the canvas.
    作者:
    Mengning Yang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Line(Point start, javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor, int thickness)
      constructor of straight line, which create a line object

      add new point to the collection of points of the line.

      This method updates the points of a line.
      void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      a override method of shape, which the line knows how to draw itself.

      • Line

        public Line(Point start,
            javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor,
            int thickness)
        constructor of straight line, which create a line object
        参数:
        start - initial point of the line
        outlineColor - color of the line
        thickness - thickness of the line
